original: 啟稟大人，屬下已遣人對<color=#bceea7>$city1</color>打草驚蛇計謀成功，清除了城內所有的細作並加強巡邏<color=#bceea7>3個月</color>！(<color=#bceea7>打草驚蛇 成功</color>)
text: Enlightenment, your subordinates have sent someone to fight against <color=#bceea7>$city1</color> successfully, clearing all the details in the city and strengthening patrols <color=#bceea7>3 months</color> >! (<color=#bceea7>Success in killing the grass and scaring the snake</color>)
